paragraphs: <italic>The actual title reads "Letter from the Steward of [Capital City]," which the game fills in appropriately. Same thing happens with all the italics in the text. Found in the Hearthfire DLC.</italic>

<italic>As a mark of the high esteem in which you are held by Jarl [Hold name], [he/she] has instructed me to offer you an opportunity to become a landowner in [Hold name]. A choice piece of undeveloped land in the hold has just become available. Please contact me if you are interested in purchasing it.</italic>

<italic>[Steward name], Steward to Jarl [Jarl name] of [Capital city]
</italic>
